the election.( Video Source Euronews) The United Nations recognizes Mr. Alassane Ouattara as the new legitimate president, so Mr. Gbagbo has called for the removal of the UN from the country. France 24 explains why. According to him and his government, the UN mission has lost its legitimacy. In recent days, state media has also falsely accused peacekeepers of shooting at civilians. Gbagbo has barred peacekeepers from entering two districts loyal to Alassane Ouattara , where the UN fear the military have been punishing civilians. But Mr. Gbagbo's supporters aren't the only ones guilty of violence.
